import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Navbar = ({parents}) => { const [isDropdownOpen, setIsDropdownOpen] = useState(false); return (
{/* Logo */}
Logo
{/* Links */}
Home {parents} {/* Profile Dropdown */}
{isDropdownOpen && (
Profile Sign In Sign Up Sign Out
)}
); }; export default Navbar;
